HomePage.title: Home
HomePage.greeting: Hello There, Welcome to My Portfolio
HomePage.description: I am a Software Engineer with expertise in various tech stacks listed on this page. I am committed to continuous learning, exploring new ideas, and improving myself to deliver better results at every opportunity. I also value collaboration, open communication, and responsibility for both code quality and the overall success of the team. Through this portfolio, I aim to showcase how I apply these values in every line of code and every project I develop.

expertise.title: Expertise
expertise.description: I have extensive experience working with a variety of technologies, including:

AboutPage.title: About Me
description: A Software Engineer with over two years of experience in developing efficient, scalable, and user-friendly software solutions. I was born in Bandung, Indonesia, on December 22, 1998, and currently reside in Garut, West Java. At present, I’m working at a software house company based in Bandung, where I contribute to building reliable and high-performance software systems.

Throughout my career, I’ve been involved in developing web-based applications, desktop applications, and data processing systems, with strong expertise in identifying and resolving software bugs efficiently. I have hands-on experience in building and consuming APIs, managing databases, implementing state management, and configuring authentication mechanisms, including Single Sign-On (SSO). In addition, I focus on optimizing application performance to ensure a seamless user experience.

I’m always eager to learn and adapt to new technologies while maintaining a collaborative approach in team environments. I’m also open to remote, freelance, or part-time opportunities, as well as new roles that foster professional growth and long-term career development.

1.summary: Contributing to the development of high-quality, reliable, and scalable software solutions at a software house based in Bandung. Responsible for implementing, and maintaining various applications while ensuring code quality, performance optimization, and adherence to best practices throughout the development process.
achievements: Build, maintain, and develop effective and efficient software applications.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams including designers, QA engineers, and product managers to deliver high-quality products.
Identify, debug, and troubleshoot software defects, find and resolve issues.
Perform code reviews and ensure adherence to coding standards and best practices.
Analyze system requirements and translate them into functional software solutions.
Ensure the security, scalability, and reliability of applications.

2.summary: Worked as a Backend Developer focusing on building and maintaining server-side applications for Maximple, a platform integrated with the Accurate accounting system. Responsible for developing RESTful APIs using Java and the Spring Boot framework, ensuring smooth data synchronization between services, debugging and resolving backend issues, and maintaining system reliability. Collaborated closely with team members and provided regular progress updates through Trello to ensure efficient project delivery.
achievements: Developed backend services for Maximple integrated with the Accurate accounting system.
Built RESTful APIs using Java programming language and the Spring Boot framework.
Debugged and resolved various issues in backend applications to ensure system stability.
Collaborated with the development team and maintained project progress reports using Trello.

projectPage.title: Projects
projectPage.description: I have contributed to various projects involving both system maintenance and development. In addition, I have several independent projects that I built personally to sharpen my skills and broaden my technical knowledge.

1.description: A second version of my personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, experiences, and skills as a software developer, featuring enhanced design and functionalities.

2.description: A web application that displays restaurant information, menus, and available services.
summary: Online table reservation with time and guest selection
Restaurant management system with Role Access: Owner, Admin, Staff, and Customer
Online food and beverage ordering (dine-in, takeaway, or delivery)
Digital payment integration (QRIS, e-wallets, and credit cards)
Analytics dashboard for sales, popular menus, and customer activity monitoring
Real-time notifications for order status and reservation confirmations
Inventory and stock management for restaurant supplies
Modern and responsive UI (desktop & mobile friendly)

3.description: DX Trade is a desktop application developed to facilitate real-time trading of digital assets and stocks. It provides market analysis tools, portfolio management, and fast, secure trade execution with an intuitive and responsive interface.
summary: Real-time digital asset and stock price updates

4.description: VHS Pertamina is a web application designed to support digitalization and improve operational efficiency within Pertamina. The platform enables integrated data management, activity monitoring, and reporting with a focus on security, performance, and ease of use.
summary: Master data, Inventory, Receiving, Sales, Ownuse, Reports, and Daily Activity management
Role-based access management: Administrator, Region, Handling Agent, Location, IMFB
Master data approval workflow for Administrator and IMFB

5.description: A data engineering project focused on building data pipelines to integrate and process operational data from various internal PLN sources. This project aims to enhance analytical efficiency, support data-driven decision-making, and ensure accurate and well-structured data availability.
summary: Integration and processing of operational data

6.description: DJKN – Business Performance is a web application developed to monitor and evaluate the performance of enterprises managed under the Directorate General of State Assets (DJKN). It provides reporting, financial data analysis, and interactive performance visualization to support strategic decision-making.
summary: Role-based access control: Administrator, Executive, Business PIC, Subdirector, Section Head, Analyst, Verifier

7.description: A management application for photography studio service operations.
summary: Studio data management: photo, video, and audio

8.description: Tourism management information system for Kampoeng Ciherang, designed to streamline operational and administrative processes.

9.description: A personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, professional experiences, and technical skills as a software developer.

10.description: Maximple is a product developed by Maksi that simplifies importing Excel data into Accurate with just one click.
